/* 다운로드 이력 count selectCount */ select count(*)::int as tot_cnt ,ceil(count(*) / ${top_cnt}::float) as page_cnt from tbl_down_hist where down_datm between (#{down_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{down_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and down_id like #{down_id} || '%'
and down_name like #{down_name} || '%'
and rec_datm between (#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
and down_src != 'AP'

/* 다운로드 이력 조회 selectList */ select (${tot_cnt}-rownum+1) as idx ,* from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}) as rownum ,to_char(A.down_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as down_datm ,A.down_id ,A.down_name ,A.down_ip ,to_char(A.rec_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rec_datm ,A.rec_keycode ,A.rec_filename ,A.user_id ,A.user_name ,A.local_no ,coalesce(A.reason_code, '') as reason_code ,coalesce(A.reason_text, '') as reason_text ,(case A.down_src when 'AP' then 'TA' else '' end) as down_src ,(case when coalesce(A.reason_code, '') != '' then fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON',A.reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code and mpart_code = B.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code and mpart_code = B.mpart_code and spart_code = B.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_down_hist A left join tbl_user B on A.down_id = B.user_id where A.down_datm between (#{down_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{down_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and A.down_id like #{down_id} || '%'
and A.down_name like #{down_name} || '%'
and A.rec_datm between (#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and A.user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and A.user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and A.reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
and a.down_src != 'AP'
order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir} limit ${top_cnt} offset (${start_cnt}-1) ) U

select to_char(A.down_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as down_datm ,A.down_id ,A.down_name ,A.down_ip ,to_char(A.rec_datm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rec_datm ,A.rec_keycode ,A.rec_filename ,A.user_id ,A.user_name ,A.local_no ,coalesce(A.reason_code, '') as reason_code ,coalesce(A.reason_text, '') as reason_text ,(case A.down_src when 'AP' then 'TA' else '' end) as down_src ,(case when coalesce(A.reason_code, '') != '' then fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON', A.reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code and mpart_code = B.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = B.bpart_code and mpart_code = B.mpart_code and spart_code = B.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_down_hist A left join tbl_user B on A.down_id = B.user_id where A.down_datm between (#{down_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{down_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and A.down_id like #{down_id} || '%'
and A.down_name like #{down_name} || '%'
and A.rec_datm between (#{rec_date1} || ' 00:00:00.000')::timestamp and (#{rec_date2} || ' 23:59:59.997')::timestamp
and A.user_id like #{user_id} || '%'
and A.user_name like #{user_name} || '%'
and A.reason_code like #{reason_code} || '%'
and A.down_src != 'AP'
order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}
